item.description:
Recently discovered a really fun Meetup group that hosts social mixers (drinks, dancing, schmoozing) at the Back Bay Hilton, in the "40 Dalton" Bar Lounge, every Friday & Saturday night.

It's a lot of fun - a very relaxed and classy spot, with great dance music (DJ kicks off @ 8pm).
Major pluses: NO cover charge & Parking is only $10 if you get your parking ticket stamped by the bartender. A real bargain by downtown Boston standards.

Come earlier than 8pm if you want to order some dinner or appetizers, or want to schmooze before the music amps up.

BRING FRIENDS! This is an event that is open to all members of the public, 35+, regardless of height. You don't have to be single to attend, but most attendees are single...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Blonde with a foreign accent & the Bodacious Brunette
item.name: Saturday Night "Wine, Dine, Dance & be Merry" Social Mixer
